mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_movie (concd,title) SELECT #{concd},#{title} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM test_movie WHERE title=#{title})
mapper.update: update test_movie set navermg =#{grade} where title =#{title}
update test_movie set cgvmg =#{grade} where title =#{title}
update test_movie set lottemg =#{grade} where title =#{title}
update test_movie set megaBoxmg =#{grade} where title =#{title}
update test_movie set daummg =#{grade} where title =#{title}
